column4: I upgraded to Fiesty from Edgy, and really like it so far. However, i use VMWARE quite a bit, which has trouble with the 2.6.20 kernel. Is it possible to downgrade the kernel?
well you can just drop a different kernel in /boot and point grub to it in /boot/grub/menu.lst but that might mess up your video drivers and such no reason not to try it
so it might mess things up pretty good eh?
i wonder if i pick the kernel froma package if it will handle all the dependencies properly...
